channel.title: Comments on: Texagon Makes First Oregon Investment in LeadMethod

item.title: By: #50startups Update: LeadMethod Hiring Away, Growing Bend-based Core Team | StartupBend
item.dc:creator: #50startups Update: LeadMethod Hiring Away, Growing Bend-based Core Team | StartupBend
item.description: […] The company raised a seed round last year from six Seattle and Oregon investors including Cascade Angels, Portland Seed Fund and Texagon Capital. […]
item.content:encoded: […] The company raised a seed round last year from six Seattle and Oregon investors including Cascade Angels, Portland Seed Fund and Texagon Capital. […]
